revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=E1200 |revision=v2 |upc= |ean= |asin=B004T9RR6I |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=10/20/2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=CyberTAN |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-E1200V2 |ic_id=3839A-E1200V2 |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM5357C0;BCM5357C0KFBG, HE1148 P30, 174754 01B W; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=25Q64BVSIG |fla1_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9425G6JH-5 |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM5357C0;BCM5357C0KFBG, HE1148 P30, 174754 01B W; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |tp_firmware=DD-WRT, Tomato (Shibby), Tomato RAF (Victek), Tomato Hyzoom |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=CiscoXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^Cisco[A-Z0-9]{5}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui=20:AA:4B,58:6D:8F |oui_eth=20:AA:4B,58:6D:8F }} '''Wireless-N300 Router'''
{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=E1200}}
E1200 v2 serial numbers may start with ''1082''.
This is the same '''CyberTAN''' board P/N as the [[Linksys E800]] and the [[Linksys E900]]. :"3763-11900102R" is silkscreened on the board.
*[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=153176 ''Linksys Cisco E1200 V2 DD-WRT Supported'' on '''DD-WRT''' forums].
The default SSID is '''CiscoXXXXX''' where '''XXXXX''' is the last 5 digits of the serial number. :If the device has been configured with Cisco Connect the device will have :a [[Cisco Connect SSIDs|randomly generated SSID]]. A sample serial number is ''10820C61254538''.
The power adapter included with the device is a '''HON-KWANG''' HK-Q106-A12 (12V, 0.5A).
===Third party firmware support=== This device is supported by.. *[http://victek.is-a-geek.com/downloads.html RAF] builds of ''Tomato by Victek''. *[http://tomato.groov.pl/download/K26RT-N/ K26RT-N] builds of ''Tomato by Shibby''. *[http://www.linksysinfo.org/index.php?threads/tomato-hyzoom-bwq518-releases.70364/ ''Tomato Hyzoom''] *most recent ''DD-WRT'' builds
